channel.title: Rebecca Romijn on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Rebecca Romijn Isn’t “Sure” She’s Done Filming for ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ Because “They Haven’t Finishing Writing” the Script
item.description: Romijn is set to reprise her role as Mystique, a character she originated in 2000’s ‘X-Men.’
